item.description:
Relive a century of Fenway Park at a special launch event for The Boston Globe’s Fenway 100 magazine. Join Globe sportswriter Dan Shaughnessy as he moderates a discussion with panelists representing former players, fans and historians, including Ken Casey of the Dropkick ...Murphys, legendary Red Sox pitcher Bill “Spaceman” Lee, Boston Globe sportswriter and author of the book Fenway 100 John Powers and author and curator of The Sports Museum Dick Johnson. Then take in an impressive traveling museum with memorabilia dating as far back as 1912.

Advance tickets: $40 http://fenway100.eventbrite.com/

Space is limited. All net proceeds benefit The Sports Museum,a 501(c)(3) non-profit educational institution.

21+
item.name: Celebrating Fenway! A Fenway 100 Magazine Launch Event
